Rulings.Tengu:
●Ninjitsu Art of Transformation does not target; you select the monster to Special Summon when you resolve its effect.
●If The Legendary Ocean is active, your WATER monsters in your hand are lowered by 1 level so if you Special Summon from your hand using Ninjitsu Art of Transformation, you can Summon at 1 level lower (effectively making it Level +4 if looking at the original Level).
●The selected card means the Tributed card.

Rulings.Base: 1. "Ninjitsu Art of Transformation" does not target; you select the monster to Special Summon when you resolve its effect.\n2. If "The Legendary Ocean" is active, your WATER monsters in your hand are lowered by 1 level so if you Special Summon from your hand using "Ninjitsu Art of Transformation", you can Summon at 1 level lower (effectively making it Level +4 if looking at the original Level).\n3. "The selected card" means the Tributed card.
